snippet: Senator John McCain deserves credit for challenging a crackpot allegation by fellow Republicans of a Muslim Brotherhood conspiracy to infiltrate the government.
abstract: Editorial credits Sen John McCain for defending Huma Abedin, senior aide to Sec of State Hillary Rodham Clinton, against absurd claims by Rep Michele Bachmann and four Republican colleagues that she is part of a Muslim Brotherhood conspiracy to infiltrate the government.
lead_paragraph: Senator John McCain deserves credit for challenging a crackpot allegation by fellow Republicans of a Muslim Brotherhood conspiracy to infiltrate the government.
